Class SocketServer

      SocketServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class SocketServer
extends Thread

Multithreaded, socket based server. TODO

  • Add a constructor that takes expectedConcurrentConnections (current constructor passes _kAverageWorkerThreads)

                          int timeoutInMilliseconds,
                          int maxData,

                   throws IOException
Helper function to read from an input stream with a timeout.

Parameters:
in - The stream to read from
timeoutInMilliseconds - The timeout
maxData - The maximum number of bytes to read (-1 for unlimited)
bufferSize - The number of bytes to attempt to read at a time (-1 for default 4k)
Returns:
The data read

IOException - If there was a problem

Parameters:

main

public static void main(String... args)
Test. Creats an echo server on port specified by 1st argument passed on command line. To kill the server, send it the letter 'd'.
